entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Tuesday 21 March 2023
